title: Evaluation of Blended Learning Design Tools and Development of Utilization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in traditional and online instructional design, and basic proficiency with digital tools
context.additional_context: Development of design strategies applicable to actual job contexts through blended learning tool evaluation in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Systematically organize learning activities using visual representation features of blended learning design tools
They can explain how to interpret integrated analytical data within the tool to optimize design decisions.
They can compare and analyze the strengths and weaknesses of blended learning tools relative to traditional instructional planning methods and assess their applicability across institutions.

resources: Blended learning design tool platform license

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
